Contact Information

  • *One phone number is required. For international phone numbers please put a + before your number.
  • **By providing an sms/text number, you agree to receive text messages from American Red Cross. Carrier charges may apply.

Directory Options

Contact information will be shared with administrative users and group leaders in Volunteer Connection. The options below control their visibility in the general directory.

Please note, access to the Exchange, the organization's intranet, is available to all volunteers, except youth and partner members. A profile will be created upon accessing the Exchange for the first time, which will include your email address. If however you have chosen to hide this information in the Volunteer Connection directory, your email address will not be listed in your Exchange profile.
